summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1771, for the improvement of East Fifty-fifth Street from Nineteenth Avenue Northeast to Twentieth Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 18670, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
